items.name: OTR
items.description: OPAMP1 offset trimming register in normal mode.

items.name: HSOTR
items.description: OPAMP1 offset trimming register in low-power mode.

fields.name: FORCE_VP
fields.description: Force internal reference on VP (reserved for test.

fields.name: PGA_GAIN
fields.description: allows to switch from AOP offset trimmed values to AOP offset.

fields.name: TSTREF
fields.description: OPAMP calibration reference voltage output control (reserved for test).

fieldset/HSOTR.description: OPAMP1 offset trimming register in low-power mode.

fieldset/OTR.description: OPAMP1 offset trimming register in normal mode.

variants.name: Calibration
variants.description: Calibration mode (all switches opened by HW)

variants.name: NormalOperating
variants.description: Normal operating mode. Non-inverting input connected to inputs.

variants.name: CalibrationVerification
variants.description: Calibration verification mode. Non-inverting input connected to calibration reference voltage.

variants.name: Gain2_FilteringVINM0
variants.description: Non-inverting internal Gain 2 with filtering on INM0, VREF- referenced

variants.name: Gain4_FilteringVINM0
variants.description: Non-inverting internal Gain 4 with filtering on INM0, VREF- referenced

variants.name: Gain8_FilteringVINM0
variants.description: Non-inverting internal Gain 8 with filtering on INM0, VREF- referenced

variants.name: Gain16_FilteringVINM0
variants.description: Non-inverting internal Gain 8 with filtering on INM0, VREF- referenced

variants.name: Gain2InvGainNeg1_InputVINM0
variants.description: Inverting gain=-1/ Non-inverting gain =2 with INM0 node for input or bias

variants.name: Gain4InvGainNeg3_InputVINM0
variants.description: Inverting gain=-3/ Non-inverting gain =4 with INM0 node for input or bias

variants.name: Gain8InvGainNeg7_InputVINM0
variants.description: Inverting gain=-7/ Non-inverting gain =8 with INM0 node for input or bias

variants.name: Gain16InvGainNeg15_InputVINM0
variants.description: Inverting gain=-15/ Non-inverting gain =16 with INM0 node for input or bias

variants.name: Gain2InvGainNeg1_InputVINM0FilteringVINM1
variants.description: Inverting gain=-1/ Non-inverting gain =2 with INM0 node for input or bias, INM1 node for filtering

variants.name: Gain4InvGainNeg3_InputVINM0FilteringVINM1
variants.description: Inverting gain=-3/ Non-inverting gain =4 with INM0 node for input or bias, INM1 node for filtering

variants.name: Gain8InvGainNeg7_InputVINM0FilteringVINM1
variants.description: Inverting gain=-7/ Non-inverting gain =8 with INM0 node for input or bias, INM1 node for filtering

variants.name: Gain16InvGainNeg15_InputVINM0FilteringVINM1
variants.description: Inverting gain=-15/ Non-inverting gain =16 with INM0 node for input or bias, INM1 node for filtering

variants.name: Pga
variants.description: Feedback resistor is connected to the OPAMP_VINM input (PGA mode), Inverting input selection depends on the PGA_GAIN setting

variants.name: Follower
variants.description: opamp_out connected to OPAMP_VINM input (Follower mode)
